name: 陳信安
objective: This course is to introduce elementary topics about solid-state physics in materials science. Topics related to the electronic property, lattice vibration and optical property would be included.
schedule:
1. Review of modern physics
2. Solid and crystal structure
3. Reciprocal lattice
4. Free electron gas
5. Energy band
6. Tight binding method
7. Band structure and density of states
8. Lattice vibration
9. Optical property
materials:
Introduction to Solid State Physics, Charles Kittel
(Optional)
Solid State Physics, Neil W. Ashcroft and N. David Mermin
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG1：消除貧窮（No Poverty）SDG3：良好健康和福祉（Good Health and Well-being）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG5：性別平等（Gender Equality）SDG7：可負擔的潔淨能源（Affordable and Clean Energy）SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）
課程是否導入AI: AI2：鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）
